title: Dante's Inferno™
description: Download the manual for this game by locating the game on http://marketplace.xbox.com and selecting “See Game Manual".   An abducted soul.  A lifetime of sins.  A journey to the depths of despair.   Based on the immensely influential classic poem, Dante’s Inferno takes you on an epic quest of vengeance and redemption through the Nine Circles of Hell.   You are Dante, a veteran of the Crusades who must chase his beloved Beatrice and try to free her soul from Lucifer’s grasp. As your pursuit takes you deeper into the pits of Hell, you must battle ever more fierce and hideous monsters—while also facing your own sins, a dark family past, and your unforgivable war crimes.    Go to Hell.

childDownloads.title: Animated Film Dante Costume
childDownloads.description: Dress Dante as one of the heroes from Starz Media’s animated feature film based on EA’s Dante’s Inferno™ video game. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Dante's Inferno™ - Gates of Hell Demo
childDownloads.description: (Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB) Dante's Inferno The Gates of Hell Demo - Discover an epic adventure based on the first part of Dante Alighieri’s masterpiece, “The Divine Comedy”. Playing as Dante, you must defeat Death and arm yourself with his scythe as you prepare to descend into the nine circles of Hell and rescue the soul of your beloved Beatrice from Lucifer himself.

childDownloads.title: Dark Forest Pack
childDownloads.description: The Dark Forest pack includes the Disco Inferno costume, Stone of Wrath relic, and a prequel level featuring new enemies, puzzles, and storyline! There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Devil Pack
childDownloads.description: This pack includes the ‘Putrid Voice’ magic ability as well as the ‘Panderer’s Lash’ relic that augments this unholy power. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Florentine Dante Costume
childDownloads.description: Dress Dante as the famous Italian poet of the Middle Ages, Dante Alighieri.  Part one of his poem The Divine Comedy serves as the backdrop for EA’s action-adventure epic Dante’s Inferno. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Free Soul Pack
childDownloads.description: Contains 500 souls. You can use souls to purchase and upgrade either Dante’s holy or unholy abilities.

childDownloads.title: Godlike Pack
childDownloads.description: This pack includes the ‘Heavens Embrace’ holy magic ability as well as the ‘Serpent of Thieves’ relic that unlocks a special scythe move. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.
